price: 26. Allah nzambe mosusu ya kobondela na bosôló azali te kaka sé ye Nkolo ya ngwende ya bonene (ya bokonzi).
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
